    • Button

      public Button()
      Creates a new Button that isn't pressed at (0,0)

    • Button

      public Button(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a new Button with the inputted values
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate for the Button to be created at
      y - the y coordinate for the Button to be created at
      width - the width of the button
      height - the height of the button

      Returns:

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo(double x, double y)
      Moves the button to a given location
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate to move to
      y - y coordinate to move to
      Postcondition:
      sets x coordinate to given x, sets y coordinate to given y

    • isPressed

      public boolean isPressed()
      Checks if the Button is pressed or not
      Returns:
      true if pressed, false if not

      Sets the button to pressed
